overview: After losing touch and not seeing each other for a year, sisters Isa and Celeste meet again. Isa has built herself a far better life, and urges her sister to do the same. Isa gives Celeste an old vinyl self-help record from the 1970s. You play it while you sleep, and it's supposed to get rid of all the negative energy in your life.
title: Don't Open Your Eyes
